record.id: field.name="active" and file.name="requestModel" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: active
record.file.name: requestModel

brief.brief: An activated model is available for selection in requests and connectors for Service Catalog items and bundles.

As soon as a model is deactivated, the system checks all Service Request Catalog items and bundles. If this model is still in use, a warning with the name of the referenced items is shown and the request model remains active. Once no references exist, the category name in the request model is renamed to ensure that this model is no longer selectable.
